message.content:
cs.IT, cs.MM, cs.SI, cs.DS, cs.LG. 

The paper deals with compression and transmission of sequential data over a noisy channel, which is a common topic in information theory (cs.IT). The use of Markov sources and the study of the rate-recovery function suggest that the paper may also belong to the sub-category of machine learning (cs.MM) or signal processing (cs.SI). The paper also establishes upper and lower bounds on the minimum rate, which involves mathematical analysis and optimization, indicating that it may also belong to the sub-categories of data structures and algorithms (cs.DS) or machine learning (cs.LG).
